status.description: Status flag. Valid values are 'active' or 'disabled'.

group.description: Group that the product belongs to

sku.description: The stock keeping unit of the product

inventoryLevel.description: Number of products available in the inventory

imageUrl.description: The FQDN of the product image

weight.description: Weight of the product in ounces

backorderAllowed.description: Enabled if a negative inventory is allowed

recurring.description: Enabled if this product is recurring on users renewal

visible.description: Enabled if this product needs to be displayed in the fulfillment toolset

available.description: Computed property that shows the availability based on inventoryLevel and backorderAllowed
